trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around July 28th 2010
Summary: A disc shaped UFO flew over my house!
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking at the moon and thought there was too many in a row then there through the trees.that's when i saw it, it was a disc shaped object with a faint blue rim and two big head lights.it sound like a jet but it would have been bigger and it would have faster.i also think that planes don't fly over my house it never happened before and the only flying thing i saw around my house was a helicopter once.but about 10:40 or 10:54 and i was watching it fly by it was close to over my tree an just at the a Little from the top head lights pointed a little to the right of my position.then it went on from there. as soon as it passed by i drew a bad speed draft and went to bed at about a 11:00 maybe. i was in the back of my house when it happen watching from from the glass double doors i don't think it saw me other wise it would probably bolted.i lost sight of it when it flew over my house.
